import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import { QuizContext } from '../Context/Context' import styled from 'styled-components' export default function HomePage() { const {gameState, setGameState} = useContext (QuizContext) return (

Welcome to the Random Trivia Challenge!

You will be presented with 10 True or False questions.

Can you score 10/10?

) } const Button = styled.button` font-size: 1.5rem; `;
